text:
I use the <junit> task with a nested <classpath> containing classes and
resources (property files and images).
In my test cases every call to:

Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader.getResourceAsStream()

or to:

ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResourceAsStream()

fails, unless fork="true" is specified.
creator: mancarella@opoipi.bancaintesa.it
mancarella@opoipi.bancaintesa.it
text:
Created attachment 814
A simple testcase for this bug.

Fixed in CVS. The context classloader was not set to the AntClassLoader 
probably due to historical reasons since JDK 1.1 is still supported.

As a workaround if the loading is in your testcase rather than your tested code 
you might use the caller classloader instead.
